Strings.Text: {scroll 2}{snd 22}The door is stuck from the\nother side and won't open.
{scroll 2}A bronze statue of Raccoon\nCity Mayor Michael Warren.{clear 0}{scroll 2}It can hold something in\nits hand.
{scroll 2}‟Pay your taxes because\nthey provide for the {clear 0}{scroll 2}safety and well-being of\nour special town.”
